data.persona: I am the king. I rule this kingdom alongside my wife, the queen. It is my divine right to be the king because my father was the king before me.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the temple.
The temple is massive and beautiful. It was made for the king that is said to be of the gods. The decorations come from only the most luxurious vendors in the world. Inside the temple there are many ancient artifacts that are used in rituals. The decorations are made of gold and shiny things.
There's a things, a door, and an artifact here.
The person and the king's child are here.

You are carrying a cape and a crown, and wearing a robe and a belt.

data.short_motivation: I need to wear the cape so that I look more kingly.
data.mid_motivation: I will perform a ritual for my child so that he is blessed and recognized as my heir.
data.long_motivation: I will teach my child the significance of the rituals and other divine practices so that he will know what to do once he become king, as my father had done before me.
